name: King #080 Rome
description:
10/15 Ultra Rare Kings [Rome]

Holder of this king can claim 1 rebase per day on 5 staked [RomeDao](https://romedao.finance) tokens for 1 year [12/12/2021 - 12/12/2022]. This can either be paid out monthly or re-staked to compound. 

Contact [Kusama Kings](https://twitter.com/kusamakings) to claim on the 12th of each month.
